item.title: Helium gas canisters and related detritus dumped on pavement and on path to Wickham Open Space, 19th September
item.description:
Last night, there were some people in a black van playing loud music, parked opposite my house. I couldn’t see what they were doing. But this morning, when I took my dog for a walk, I noticed the mess that had left behind after using helium gas.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camdale Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rough sleeper, 19th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Footpaths Across Hackney Downs, Hackney, London

item.title: Bushes and shrubs overgrown in front of Beckenham library, 19th September

item.title: This is a request for street cleaning., 19th September
item.description:
This is a request for street cleaning.The small Bennett Grove SE13 7RF has not been cleaned for many months.Cleaning of the street is covered by the council tax payments every month.Same applies to the bins collection.Three or four times in the last few months bins were not collected in Bennett Grove SE13 7RF

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coldbath Street, London
